backend/main.mo: Actor implementing role‑based access control and storing user profiles with admin-managed allowlisting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Valentine UI enhancements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference document listing concise summaries for all existing frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint that loads the React frontend and mounts the root application element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, allowlist checks, and routing to the Valentine experience.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown to authenticated but non-allowlisted users with a logout option.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Sign‑in screen using Internet Identity with animated heart visuals.
frontend/src/components/layout/Valentine: Shared themed layout providing background art, floating hearts, and footer for all screens.
frontend/src/features/valentine/gifts/Gi: Provides an audio gift player with play/pause controls, error handling, and scrollable lyrics.
Shows a virtual bouquet image with decorative icons and a short message.
Allows editing and revealing a heartfelt message with a styled display mode.
Displays a formatted romantic poem with decorative heart elements.
frontend/src/features/valentine/GiftsScr: Gift selection interface allowing users to choose between four gifts and view the corresponding component.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Question: Displays the main Valentine question with animated hearts and handles Yes/No interactions, triggering an alarm animation on No.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Valentin: Controls the Valentine flow state, switching between the question screen and the gifts screen on Yes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllowlistGate.ts: Checks whether the current user is allowlisted using the actor and exposes loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and actions via Internet Identity, handling identity loading and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark Valentine-themed color schemes, plus base typography and border/background utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters and sessionStorage-backed values for routing and state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH theme colors, animations, typography, container queries, and extended utilities.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and pending requests related to adding red alarm-style feedback on 'No' clicks.
